amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $500,000 from being used for the Millennium Technology Park in New Castle, Pennsylvania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 111-219 to prohibit $500,000 from being used for the Millennium Technology Park in New Castle, Pennsylvania, and reduce the amount of the appropriate section of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 329 (Roll no. 632).
